component.name: listTasks
component.description: Returns all tasks in the specified task list.

component.name: insertTask
component.description: Creates a new task on the specified task list.

component.name: deleteTask
component.description: Deletes the specified task from the task list.

component.name: clearTask
component.description: Clears all completed tasks from the specified task list.The affected tasks will be marked as 'hidden' and no longer be returned by default when retrieving all tasks for a task list.

component.name: moveTask
component.description: Moves the specified task to another position in the task list. This can include putting it as a child task under a new parent and/or move it to a different position among its sibling tasks.

component.name: patchTask
component.description: Updates the specified task. This method supports patch semantics.
